concept.title: Kafka Producer
concept.shortdesc: The Kafka Producer writes data to a Kafka cluster.

conbody.p: Kafka Producer destinationoverviewdestinationsKafka ProducerWhen you configure a Kafka Producer, you define connection information, the partition strategy, and data format to use. You can add additional Kafka configuration properties as needed. You can also configure Kafka Producer to determine the topic to write to at runtime.
The Kafka Producer passes data to partitions in the Kafka topic based on the partition strategy that you choose. You can optionally write a batch of records to the Kafka cluster as a single message.
